nodes.bodyText: can make this default as well, where the default implementation throws an exception. That way, plugins are not forced to implement this deprecated method.

nodes.bodyText: avoid using classes from other libraries in the api modules. You can throw a UnsupportedOperationException instead.

use {@link #getJoinKeys()} instead
that way the javadoc will link to the method.
